titleStmt.title: Seventeen sermons preach'd upon several occasions never before printed / by William Clagett ... with The summ of a conference on February 21, 1686, between Dr. Clagett and Father Gooden, about the point of transubstantiation.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
"The summ of a conference on Feb. 21. 1686 ..." has special t.p. and separate paging.
Pages 37-57 and 320-361 from Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
